category.name: Active Workspace.Substance Compliance
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SUBSCMPLAW_AllowOnlyCMDForRequest
preference.preference_description: Indicates if only CMD request should be allowed for objects to which CMD applicable. Valid values are: true: Request allows only for CMD objects.This is the default value. false: Request allows for both MSD and CMD objects.
